body:
Hey Guys,
Lookibg for a good microphone for Christmas and wondering what you guys think? 
I'm not looking for a headset. I'm looking for like a professional microphone. My budget is about 100 Australian dollars. Also might be needing to look for a clip-on desk swivel stand as well. 

I am going to keep on looking but wondering what you guys can find. 
Thanks.

replies.body: Yeah, I have the Snowball and I'd say it's a decent mic. Only problem for me is mic positioning meaning I had to make quite a few adjustments to prevent everyone from hearing major keyboard smashing xd. But yeah honestly I'd say the Snowball is the best low cost mic with regards to audio quality as far as I'm aware.
